ItemTooltips.blades_of_attack: Blades of Attack give you a lot of early lasthitting+ damage
ItemTooltips.boots: Leather boot before midas unless you expect a sub 7 minute midas timing
ItemTooltips.flask: You can take Tango's instead if you see fit
ItemTooltips.tpscroll: Extremely usefull to have, but use better judgement
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Improved rune control and massive damage
ItemTooltips.hand_of_midas: Great for catching up when behind, Great for getting a greater lead, Make sure to use on large neutral creeps!
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Allows a one shot combo consisting of Eul's, Sunstrike as they are up, And meatball where they land
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Pushstick gives you a lot of positioning and mobility
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Shorter cooldown on invoke and no mana cost! more spells and faster fight translation
ItemTooltips.refresher: This is an EXTENSION item! If you decide to be refreshing you need to start working on it before any other extensions though (Only exception being BKB)
ItemTooltips.assault: Better off buying if you plan to solo carry
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: A lot more team fight survivability
ItemTooltips.skadi: Loda Doda we Like To Skoda
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Gives you a lot of direct benefits and early kill potential, Also helps team later on

AbilityTooltips.invoker_cold_snap: Cold snap gives you a good single target stun, letting you stay on a target rather then keeping them in place, Early game you can use a mix of this and forgespirits for some serious ministunning goodness
AbilityTooltips.invoker_ghost_walk: If you see yourself getting in sticky situations early you can get a point in wex BEFORE level 11, giving you many escapes including ghostwalk, REMEMBER! The coldfeet debuff means people near you know you are there
AbilityTooltips.invoker_tornado: A good ranged CC, not much for damage and shouldn't be used during fights, Can be used to line up a Deafening Blast
AbilityTooltips.invoker_emp: For this build it doesn't do much until level 23, Too high manacost to worry about with this build until super late when you just need to spam a spell, Burns there mana and does damage based on burned mana
AbilityTooltips.invoker_alacrity: Auto attack steroid, When solo pushing cast this on yourself when you go for towers, in fights make sure to cast it on any agi carrys you may or maynot have. Tip for remembering it: IT MAKES YOU BETTER AT FIGHTING, WWE, WORLD WRESTLING!
AbilityTooltips.invoker_chaos_meteor: A long range slow moving high damage DoT AOE, Use with Defining Blast to keep them in the aoe, Use primairly for group fights, not solo kills early on (Unless you see clear potential)
